descriptionHtml:
Hi everyone and welcome to my first scripted mod for Skyrim!

This simple mod will make sleeping more important than before, by changing a simple aspect...
Whenever the player is rested, he will be flagged as ESSENTIAL.
What does it mean?
It means that basically, you cannot die while under the RESTED (or WELLRESTED or MARRIAGERESTED) effect. Beware, though, because if the player is bleeding out, the effect will be deleted from your character.
Sleeping will give you ONE chance to survive the fight; you lose STAMINA when you\'re on your knees.

Install: 

* Put WarriorRest.BSA and WarriorRest.esp in your DATA folder - by default C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim
* Check the mod in your favorite Mod Manager.
* Play the game and enjoy.

Please, give me feedback if you find bugs.

[img]http://www.confrerie-des-traducteurs.fr/forum/upload/Moorelf/Moorelf_1328629167_logo_sagittarius3.png[/img]
author: Sagittarius22

files.name: Last man standing - Another chance 5dot0
files.changelogHtml:
Adds a random cooldown effect (from 6 to 12 ingame hours) to prevent cheating.
Adds more effects for example for people who play with a pad (it will shake whenever you\'re bleeding out).
